abstract: Two chefs from Delhi's famed tandoor restaurant earn kudos in New York City.
snippet: Two chefs from Delhi's famed tandoor restaurant earn kudos in New York City.
lead_paragraph: Indian food in Manhattan just entered a new era, with three upscale restaurants, Junoon, Tamarind Tribeca and Tulsi all earning stars in the latest Michelin guide, published this month.

headline.main: From Bukhara to Haute Indian in Manhattan
